doc:
Mark Lenard https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mark_Lenard 0 Mark Lenard (born Leonard Rosenson, October 15, 1924 – November 22, 1996) was an American actor, primarily in television. His most famous role was as Sarek, father of the popular character Spock, in the science fiction Star Trek franchise, in both the original and animated series, as well as three films and two episodes of Star Trek: The Next Generation. He also played a Klingon in Star Trek The Motion Picture, and a Romulan in an episode of Star Trek: The Original Series. Mark_Lenard ( born Leonard_Rosenson , October_15_,_1924 – November_22_,_1996 ) was an_American_actor , primarily in television . His_most_famous_role was as Sarek , father of the_popular_character_Spock , in the_science_fiction_Star_Trek_franchise , in both the_original_and_animated_series , as_well_as three_films and two_episodes of Star_Trek : The_Next_Generation . He also played a_Klingon in Star_Trek_The_Motion_Picture , and a_Romulan in an_episode of Star_Trek : The_Original_Series .
